The/DT most/RBS fundamental/JJ human/JJ right/NN ,/, after/IN the/DT necessities/NNS of/IN food/NN ,/, clothing/NN and/CC shelter/NN ,/, is/VBZ the/DT right/NN to/IN affection/NN and/CC the/DT supportive/JJ love/NN of/IN other/JJ human/JJ beings/NNS ./.

>/NFP From/IN the/DT shameful/JJ history/NN of/IN slavery/NN in/IN America/NNP ,/, the/DT injustice/NN of/IN forbidding/VBG people/NNS to/TO marry/VB is/VBZ evident/JJ as/IN a/DT denial/NN of/IN a/DT basic/JJ human/JJ right/NN ./.

"/`` He/PRP Would/MD Tear/VB Down/RP Our/PRP$ System/NN Of/IN Checks/NNS And/CC Balances/NNS ,/, Giving/VBG Far/RB Too/RB Much/JJ Power/NN To/IN The/DT President/NNP ./. "/''
